title: WeChat Chat Bot
text:
A Python-based chatbot for WeChat, integrating OpenAI‚Äôs API for AI-powered conversations.
The WeChat Chatbot enhances WeChat interactions by providing AI-driven conversational responses in real time. Built with Python, it leverages wxauto for WeChat automation and OpenAI‚Äôs API for intelligent, context-aware replies. This project showcases expertise in chatbot development, automation, and large language model (LLM) integration.

Purpose

Automate conversational responses using AI.

Maintain context for more relevant and coherent interactions.

Demonstrate Python-based WeChat automation and LLM API integration.



Key Features
‚úÖ OpenAI Integration ‚Äì AI-driven responses with conversation history management.
‚úÖ WeChat Automation ‚Äì Auto-retrieves and processes messages using wxauto.
‚úÖ Context-Aware Conversations ‚Äì Builds conversation context dynamically for better responses.
‚úÖ Background Processing ‚Äì Runs a background process for real-time message handling.
The chatbot functions as an AI assistant for WeChat, streamlining communication with automated, intelligent responses. It is designed to work with PC WeChat version 3.9.11.17.
üîó GitHub Repository: ChatBot_WeChat
üöÄ Tech Stack: Python, OpenAI API, wxauto, threading, logging
This project is a hands-on practice in AI-driven automation, chatbot development, and NLP-enhanced user interactions.

title: Personal Memo System ‚Äì SQL, React & Python
text:
work in progress
A full-stack personal memo system leveraging MySQL, Express.js, React, and Python for structured data storage, automation, and analytics.
The Personal Memo System is designed to help users efficiently store, manage, and analyze structured personal data, such as financial records, health metrics, and goal tracking. By integrating SQL for data storage, Express.js for API management, React for a user-friendly interface, and Python for automation and analytics, this project serves as a comprehensive digital organization tool.

Purpose:
Provide a secure and structured memo management system for various personal data. Enable automated data backups and trend analysis for financial and health tracking. Offer an intuitive React-based frontend for easy data entry and visualization. Showcase full-stack development skills with SQL, API development, and Python automation.


Key Features:
‚úÖ MySQL Database ‚Äì Secure storage with relational data management.
‚úÖ Express.js API ‚Äì RESTful backend for seamless CRUD operations.
‚úÖ React Frontend ‚Äì Interactive UI for managing memos and visualizing trends.
‚úÖ Python Automation ‚Äì Scheduled database backups and analytical reports.
‚úÖ Data Analysis ‚Äì Uses Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn to provide insights.
The project is deployed on a Virtual Machine and integrates authentication, category-based organization, and an API-driven backend for structured data management.
üîó GitHub Repository: MemoTrack-SQL
üöÄ Tech Stack: MySQL, Express.js, React, Node.js, Python, Flask, Pandas, Tailwind CSS, Chart.js
This project is a practical learning experience, combining database management, backend development, frontend UI, automation, and data analytics into a single, full-stack system.

title: Zhiyuan Zhou
text:
Hi there! I‚Äôm Zhiyuan Zhou, an economics and data science enthusiast with a passion for turning complex data into actionable insights. I‚Äôm graduating from UCLA in June 2025 with degrees in Economics and Statistics & Data Science, where I honed my skills in data analysis, statistical modeling, and quantitative decision-making.
When I‚Äôm not crunching numbers or building models, you‚Äôll find me exploring nature on a hike, capturing moments through my camera lens, or experimenting with new recipes in the kitchen. I‚Äôm also a proud cat lover and enjoy spending time with my furry companion MerMerüêæ.
I‚Äôm always eager to connect, collaborate, and learn, so feel free to reach out‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs about data, photography, or the best way to cook a perfect stir-fry!
